message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're proposing a price of $120 for it. We hope this aligns with your expectations and look forward to your consideration.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $90?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. However, I must maintain the value of our product. I propose a price of $100 for the item. This allows us to cover our costs while still being competitive in the market.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of offering $92. Can you consider this price point?
